enam yam awasthawaka kenek kama sithiwili, wyapada sithiwili, hinsa sithiwili, thama sithen wiryayen durukarayi da, abhawayata path karayi da, iwath karayida, eya iwath kirimen aashrawa durukirima yayi datha yuthu ya.awasana washayen thathagathayan wahanse deshana karanuye bhawanawen aashrawa paha kirima ganaya.yam shrawakayek wiwekaya, wiragaya, nirodhaya aadhara kota, sathi sambojjhangaya, dhamma wichaya sambojjhangaya, wirya sambojjhangaya, pi්rathi sambojjhangaya, passaddhi sambojjhangaya, samadhi sambojjhangaya, upekkha sambojjhangaya wadanne da ohuta nupanna wu aashrawa nupadinneya, upanna wu aashrawa duru wi yanneya.me aakarayen yam shrawakayeku wisin darshanayen sanwarayen nisi pariharanayen, iwasimen, warjanayen, bahara kirimen ha bhawanawen yana aakara 7 kin aashrawa prahanaya kirimata daksha wanne da, hethema thrushnawa sinda damana ayaku wanneya.

pasala nimawi wan rathaya paminenathuru pasala asala randi siti 5 wasare dariyan hathara denek dushanaya kirime siddhiyak sambandhayen warada piligath pudgalayakuta barapathala wada sahitha wasara wissaka siradanduwama ekawara gewi yana se labadena lesa mahanuwara mahadhikarana winisuru manilal waidyathilaka mahatha niyoga keleya.mese danduwam niyama wuye gampola padinchi mohomad shekmidar amikdin namathi asu dehawiridi pudgalayakutaya.mohu 2004 wasaredi gampola pradhana pasalak asala jangama welenda salak pawathwagena gos athi athara, tofi, sinibola, bombayimotayi di sidu dariyan rawata jangama welendasala thula di dushanayata lakkirime chodanawa matha gampola polisiya magin athadangawata gena adhikaranaya wetha idiripath kota thibini.gampola, mariyawaththa, welambada saha watadeniya pradeshawala wayasa awurudu 9ka dariyan wiwidha athawarayanta lakkaramin dushanaya kirima sambandhayen ohuta erehiwa nithipathiwaraya hamuwe adhi chodana pathra atak gonukota thibini.siddhiya sambandhayen sakshi wimasimen pasu ek ek chodanawata wasara dekakuth masa haya bagin barapathala wada sahitha siradanduwam labadena lesath, eya ekawara gewi yana se labadena lesath mahadhikarana winisuwaraya niyoga keleya.adala siddhiya sambandhayen rajaya wenuwen, rajaye adhinithignya kushika kumarasiri menawiyath, agathiyata path parshawa wenuwen aruni dhanapala saha thelkarage yana nithignyawarun peni siti athara withthikaru wenuwen nithignya mapalagama mahatha peni sitiyeya..
